titles.title: I'm Going To Sing, Sing, Sing

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm going to sing, sing, sing.
I'm going to shout, shout, shout.
I'm going to sing, I'm going to shout,
Praise the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
When those gates are open wide,
I'll be there by Jesus' side.
I'm going to sing, I'm going to shout,
Praise the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I'm going to walk, walk, walk, etc.
I'm going to talk, talk, talk, etc.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Cantare y alabare, cantare,
Alabare, gloria a Dios.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Cuando las prisiones se abriran,
Junto a Cristo yo estare.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: Cantare y alabare, gloria a Dios.
